channel.title: Velvet Squid - Experts in web & mobile, brand identity, creative direction, and innovation.
channel.description: Velvet Squid is a Sydney based design studio focusing on creating pixel perfect digital media. If you are a small business owner with a killer idea, or an established brand looking for creative direction, we can help you bring your ideas to life in print, web, and digital media.

item.title: Velvet Squid - Tyroe Marketing
item.description:
Tyroe - Marketing

Promotional landing page and videos, business cards, and branding.

The client required a full suite of marketing material for their SAAS product. The landing pages were used to build their Mailchimp Newsletter. Two promotional videos were created in-house to drive traffic to the Tyroe website. Business cards, brochures, and stickers were designed and printed for use at various live events.

Promotional video used to showcase the benefits of the service and encourage pre-registrations.

item.title: Velvet Squid - Promotional Videos
item.description:
Promo Video

Annual promotional videos to engage community.

The Rookies

The Rookies (formerly the CG Student Awards) use our team annually to get the word out to their fans and build some hype. Each year, the videos need to be fast paced, engaging, and informative.

Previous Next

item.title: Velvet Squid - Rice Warner
item.description:
RiceWarner

Australias leading financial consultants.

Step No.

01

Wireframe.

To allow for quick and interactive design iterations, a simple wireframe was built using Photoshop and Sketch. This was then added to Invision for client testing.

Step No.

02

Mockup.

After wireframes had been locked down, colour and final content was added to Photoshop files and Invision was upated to showcase a finished mockup with interactions.

Step No.

03

Delivery.

The project was delivered using Wordpress CMS. The reason for this decision was to allow staff to update the site content and publish blog posts every week.

Previous Next

item.title: Velvet Squid - Tyroe
item.description:
Tyroe - Applicant Tracking System & Portfolio Service

Recruitment SAAS product used by studios to find junior artists.

The project required a great deal of wireframing, workflow design, and prototypes. Intial concepts and workflows were fleshed out using Photoshop and good old pen/paper. From here Photoshop concepts were developed for all usertypes and uploaded to InVision to create working mockups. Full working HTML prototypes were developed for the Software Developer brief.

Custom built recruitment application

Recruitment Simplified

Fully compatible and stable

100% Mobile Responsive

Unqualified Applicants

Wasted time sifting through applicants applying for jobs which they are clearly unqualified.

No Team Feedback

Key stakeholders involved with candidate selection are often too busy to review applications.

Volume of Applicants

Not enough time or resources to respond to all applicants or provide some form of feedback to help them.

Juggling Websites

Submitting jobs and managing applications coming in from company website, job boards, and forum

Data Entry

Adding candidates to a database, sifting through feedback from staff, and manually inserting notes

Rejection Process

The uncomfortable process of informing applicants they were not selected for the job opening

Advanced portfolio building system

One-page member portfolios

Previous Next

item.title: Velvet Squid - Babyology
item.description:
Babyology

E-commerce solution for subscription box service.

Packages delivered to your door.

Subscription Box Service

Velvet Squid was contracted by Babyology to design and build a landing page for their new subscription boxes. The project had a very short delivery schedule and required some seriously fast design and development. The landing page integrated an e-Commerce solution that allowed visitors to purchase a variety of packages.

Porject Breakdown.

The challenge

Working to an insanely tight deadline and a client with a highly established reputation for quality.

Key components

Design.

The design needed to reflect the clients existing style guide which included the use of fonts and colour palettes. The solution needed a clean, simple, and striking design.

Concept.

The concept came together quite quickly with the objective to keep everything accessible on one page. Scrolling from top to bottom, the user would be pitched the product, it's benefits, read testimonials, and be directed to call-to-action purchasing buttons.

Delivery.

The final deliveries included a complete HTML website, integrated into a third-party subscription package tool to track orders and manage custom service.

Client:Babyology Pty Ltd.

Date:02 August, 2014

Type:Website, E-Commerce

http://babyology.com.au/boxes/

Babyology is the online market leader in high-quality product-focused editorial content for Australian parents.

Babyology is the premium online resource for parents, providing information and reviews on products and services for them and their children. It facilitates a community where parents can discuss products and services and ask questions of experts in the field.

Previous Next

item.title: Velvet Squid - The Rookies
item.description:
The Rookies

International competition for junior creatives

Short description.

The challenge

Design and build a full CMS to handle image and video submissions from thousands of students around the world.

Key components

Design.

The client required a clean and intuative user interface for artists to submit work, find schools, and read articles.

Development.

The site was developed using Wordpress. Multiple custom plugins were created to handle different actions and processes.

Delivery.

The site was delivered in 4 months which included full concept wireframes through to finished product testing and version control releases.

Client:CG Student Awards Pty Ltd.

Date:12 December, 2015

Type:Design, Development, Website.

The client runs a successful online awards that discovers the next generation of creators, innovators, and artists. The client had recently rebranded and was looking for a new website and CMS to handle the growing community.

The project involved handling everything from concept wireframes through to the delivery of a working prototype. The most interesting and complex area of the build was creating an engaging, yet simple, entry page for each member.

Previous Next

item.title: Velvet Squid - Australia Post
item.description:
Australia Post - Benefit & Retirement Calculator

Re-design of Australia Post retirement website and tools.

The Brief

Velvet Squid was contracted to create a set of wireframe mockups to help improve the existing Benefit & Retirement Calculator used by Australia Post. The existing tool was very dated, and was causing staff many issues, which were due to the poor user experience. The goal of these wireframes were to show how simple and fast it could be to completely overhaul the user-flow, gather more relevant information, and allow staff to really dig into the data and maximise their return.

Client:Australia Post

Date:23 February, 2015

Type:Website, UI, UX.

The client was looking to redesign their staff portal for accessing their retirement and benefits information. The challenge was to condense and simplify the data into as few pages as possible and still have a clear user journey.

These wireframes were the result of user testing and revisions both internally and externally. The success of this project was it's ability to remove all the confusing steps and bloated content and strip the tool back to it's core objective, all while keeping the user informed at each stage.

Previous Next

item.title: Velvet Squid - CG Student Awards
item.description:
cgstudentawards.com

Creative community for young digital artists.

Client:CG Student Awards Pty Ltd.

Date:12 January, 2015

Link:www.cgstudentawards.com

Type:Redesign, Branding, Website, Video

The CG Student Awards is a creative community for young digital artists studying Visual Effects, Animation, and Next-Gen Gaming. The backbone of the website includes a portfolio system for students, and a review system for the judging panel.

The client required a complete redesign of their existing site, brand identity, and an overhaul of the backend systems in place to deal with 500,000 monthly visitors and over 1,000 student entries submitted over a 3 month peak period.

item.title: Velvet Squid - Sovereign
item.description:
Sovereign

Official harbour stamp branding.

One of the largest yachts available for charter in Australia, Sovereign proudly offers European standards to an emerging region. At 44.2m, SOVEREIGN has been recently launched to the charter market by her experienced Owners.

SOVEREIGN required a new official harbour stamp for all purchasing orders and international travel requirements. The brief required a traditional nautical theme with information simple and easy to read.

Previous Next

item.title: Velvet Squid - Vanguard Investments
item.description:
Vanguard Investments

Key Facts Statement iPad App.

Client:Vangaurd Investements Australia Ltd.

Date:01 February, 2015

Link:https://www.vanguardinvestments.com.au/

Type:Wireframing, Mockups, iPad Application

Short description.

The challenge

Working with a high profile corporate client with a strong legacy of tradition was a challenging experience. The goal was to push them beyond their comfort zone and convert a content heavy document into an engaging iPad Application.

Short description.

The process

After a string of innitial meetings, our team spent a huge amount of time developing wireframe mockups and concepts. These were used to test the theory and user experience. Once approved, the team built a full working prototype.

Short description.

The solution

The solution was simple. Condense a content heavy key facts statement into a beautiful and simple digital brochure. Gamification was introduced, bright colours, and subtle animations were all used to enhance the experience.

Previous Next
